item.title: Learning Lifetime parameters in Rust: Writing a simple Lisp evaluator
item.description: Link to the problem description Brief description - We are given a valid Lisp expression. The expression types are Integer: An integer which evaluates to the same value (positive or negative) Let: Used to introduce new variables into the scope Add: (add e1 e2) where e1 and e2 expressions evaluate to integers. It evaluates to the sum of the two Mult: (mult e1 e2) where e1 and e2 expressions evaluate to integers.
